physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two ladies. One of them is sitting down while the other is standing up. Both of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. They are wearing their ethnic costumes as well. There is a piano at the background. Both ladies are resting their hands and elbows respectively on a table that is covered with a cloth in the middle of the photograph.

sgcool_label_text:The photograph shows two Indo Eurasian woman (probably a mother and daughter) posing with a piano in the background. The younger woman wears a fashionable kebaya of the late 19th century.\r\n\r\nWith continuous improvement of camera technology
 it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life
 or documentasi keluarga.

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
The photograph shows two Indo Eurasian woman (probably a mother and daughter) posing with a piano in the background. The younger woman wears a fashionable kebaya of the late 19th century.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
